risk-description:
Trading on Margin in cryptocurrencies and their derivatives, or the Forex market, carries high volatility and high risks that may cause losses to your capital.
In addition, the services and products might not be suitable for everyone. Coinlocally LLC by registration number as 264.110.1196642 and with physical and register address of Kanaker HES, Kanaker-Zeytun, Yerevan, Armenia, is not responsible for any losses in the market, which can be partial or total to your assets.
Coinlocally, any affiliated individual and its company partners have no responsibility for your trading or investing results, whether they are profits or losses. Please make sure that you are aware of all the risks involved. We recommend that you consider the risks associated with these services and products.
Coinlocally LLC does not provide any services in USA.
